title: Etzel Micha
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Israeli, Yemenite
description: Small restaurant offering home-style food made on the premises. There is hummus with toppings like mushroom and pine nuts, soup, salad, and a soy-based "malabi" dessert. Vegans be sure to mention that you only want vegan (tivoni) dishes; some items contain egg. No charge for soy milk, and you could get its special sauces and olives to take away.
